TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapReflectionImporter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Generates mappings to SOAP-encoded messages from .NET Framework types or Web service method information.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>类提供类型映射到 SOAP 编码消息部分，如在 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中定义。 它是仅当时使用的 Web 服务或客户端指定 SOAP 编码，如 SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中所述。
## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>创建相应的属性设置，并添加到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>使用创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>，且<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>用于创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>可重写默认的序列化。
[!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

Generates a mapping to an XML Schema element for a .NET Framework type.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping (string elementName, string ns, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping(string elementName, string ns, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members) cil managed
Public Function ImportMembersMapping (elementName As String, ns As String, members As XmlReflectionMember()) As XmlMembersMapping

public: System::Xml::Serialization::XmlMembersMapping ^ ImportMembersMapping(System::String ^ elementName, System::String ^ ns, cli::array <System::Xml::Serialization::XmlReflectionMember ^> ^ members);
member this.ImportMembersMapping : string * string * System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] -> System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping

Docs.param: An XML element name produced from the Web service method.
An XML element namespace produced from the Web service method.
An array of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method.
Docs.summary: Generates internal type mappings for information that is gathered from a Web service method.
Docs.returns: Internal .NET Framework type mappings to the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportMembersMapping%2A>时初始化 Web 服务或客户端，或者在反射 Web 服务调用方法。 不需要直接调用它。
以下列表介绍的可能值`members`参数：
- Web 服务方法输入的参数。
- Web 服务方法输出参数，以及返回类型，如果不是 void，位于索引零。
- SOAP 输入标头。
- SOAP 输出标头。

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping (string elementName, string ns, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members, bool hasWrapperElement, bool writeAccessors);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping ImportMembersMapping(string elementName, string ns, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] members, bool hasWrapperElement, bool writeAccessors) cil managed
Public Function ImportMembersMapping (elementName As String, ns As String, members As XmlReflectionMember(), hasWrapperElement As Boolean, writeAccessors As Boolean) As XmlMembersMapping

public: System::Xml::Serialization::XmlMembersMapping ^ ImportMembersMapping(System::String ^ elementName, System::String ^ ns, cli::array <System::Xml::Serialization::XmlReflectionMember ^> ^ members, bool hasWrapperElement, bool writeAccessors);
member this.ImportMembersMapping : string * string * System.Xml.Serialization.XmlReflectionMember[] * bool * bool -> System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping

Docs.param: An XML element name produced from the Web service method.
An XML element namespace produced from the Web service method.
An array of .NET Framework code entities that belong to a Web service method.
to indicate that elements that correspond to WSDL message parts should be enclosed in an extra wrapper element in a SOAP message; otherwise, .
to indicate an RPC-style Web service binding; to indicate a document-style Web service binding or a SOAP header.
Docs.summary: Generates internal type mappings for information that is gathered from a Web service method.
Docs.returns: Internal .NET Framework type mappings to the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

to indicate that elements that correspond to WSDL message parts should be enclosed in an extra wrapper element in a SOAP message; otherwise, .

to indicate that a generated deserializer should check for the expected qualified name of the wrapper element; otherwise, . This parameter's value is relevant only if the hasWrapperElement parameter's value is .
